about.title: About HUBTRAC

history.title: Our History
history.content: With over 49 years of experience in the tire industry, HUBTRAC represents a European leader in commercial vehicle tire solutions. Our journey began with a simple mission: to provide premium products and unmatched service to our clients.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide top-tier mobile tire service that minimizes downtime and maximizes productivity for commercial vehicle fleets. We combine European quality with local expertise and flexibility.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is our priority. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

overview.title: Overview
content: HUBTRAC Ltd. ("we", "us", "our") is responsible for processing your personal data in accordance with the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) (EU 2016/679) and applicable national data protection laws.
This privacy policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and what rights you have regarding your personal data.

dataCollection.title: What Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: When using our mobile tire services, we may collect the following data:
items: Identification data: first name, last name, title
Contact data: phone number, email address, postal address
Vehicle data: vehicle type, registration number, tire information
Location data: service location address (with your consent)
Business data: order history, invoices, payment information
Technical data: IP address, browser type, cookies (when visiting the website)

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUse.content: We use your personal data exclusively for the following purposes:
items: Providing mobile tire services and fulfilling contractual obligations
Communicating with you regarding your orders and services
Invoicing and accounting purposes
Improving the quality of our services
Sending marketing information (only with your consent)
Fulfilling legal obligations (accounting, tax records)
Protecting our legitimate interests and rights

dataProtection.title: How We Protect Your Data
content: We implement strict technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, loss, destruction, or alteration.
Your data is stored on secure servers with encryption. Access to personal data is limited to authorized employees who need this data to perform their duties.
We do not sell or rent your data to third parties for marketing purposes without your explicit consent.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
content: Our website uses cookies to improve your user experience. Cookies are small text files stored on your device.
We use the following types of cookies:
items: Necessary cookies: required for basic website functionality
Analytical cookies: help us understand how visitors use our website (e.g., Google Analytics)
Functional cookies: enable language preferences and customization
Marketing cookies: used for targeted advertising (only with your consent)

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
items: Right to access your personal data
Right to rectify incorrect or incomplete data
Right to erasure of your data ("right to be forgotten")
Right to restriction of processing
Right to data portability
Right to object to processing
Right to withdraw consent to data processing
Right to lodge a complaint with the competent data protection authority

contact.title: Contact
content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:
Email: privacy@hubtrac-example.com

Address: [Company Address], Europe

questions.title: Questions about data protection?
questions.content: We're here to help with any questions regarding your personal data.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Terms and conditions for HUBTRAC mobile tire service

overview.title: General Terms
content: These Terms of Service govern the rights and obligations between HUBTRAC Ltd., [Registration Number], with registered office at [Address] (hereinafter "Provider") and the customer (hereinafter "Customer") in the provision of mobile tire services for commercial vehicles.
By entering into a contract or ordering a service, the Customer confirms that they have read these Terms of Service and agree to them.

services.title: Scope of Services
services.content: The Provider offers the following services:
items: Mobile tire service: tire replacement, mounting and dismounting directly at the customer's location
24/7 emergency service: round-the-clock availability in case of breakdown or emergency
Tire repair: professional repair of damaged tires
Tire sales: supply and sale of HUBTRAC and other tire brands
Expert consultation: advice on selecting the right tires
Regular maintenance: checking tire pressure, wear, and tread depth

pricing.title: Prices and Payment Terms
content: Service prices are set in the Provider's current price list. Prices include labor, materials, and travel within the agreed area. Surcharges for travel outside the standard area or for services outside business hours will be communicated in advance.
Payment is due immediately after service provision or according to agreed payment terms. We accept cash, card payments, or bank transfers.
In case of payment delay, the Provider reserves the right to charge late payment interest at 0.05% per day on the outstanding amount.

warranty.title: Warranty and Claims
content: We provide a 6-year warranty on all HUBTRAC tires against manufacturing defects. The warranty does not cover mechanical damage, improper use, or natural wear.
We provide a 12-month warranty on services rendered (mounting, repair).
Claims must be submitted in writing or electronically without undue delay after discovering the defect. The Provider will process the claim within 30 days of receipt.

liability.title: Liability and Limitation of Liability
content: The Provider is liable for damages caused by defective service provision in accordance with applicable laws.
The Provider is not liable for damages caused by improper use of tires by the Customer, inadequate vehicle maintenance, or circumstances beyond its control (force majeure).
The Provider's liability is limited to direct damages and does not exceed the total value of the paid order.
The Customer is required to ensure safe access to the vehicle and provide necessary cooperation during service provision.

userObligations.title: Customer Obligations
items: Provide correct and complete information about the vehicle and required services
Ensure a safe and accessible location for service performance
Pay the agreed price for services within the specified timeframe
Follow the Provider's recommendations regarding tire maintenance and use
Notify of cancellation at least 24 hours in advance (otherwise a cancellation fee may apply)
Provide necessary vehicle documentation for service performance

disputes.title: Dispute Resolution
content: The Provider undertakes to resolve any disputes with the Customer primarily through out-of-court means.
In case of a dispute, the Customer may contact the competent consumer protection authority or use the alternative dispute resolution platform.
Consumers have the right to contact the competent consumer protection authority or the EU Online Dispute Resolution platform.
Legal relationships not covered by these Terms of Service are governed by relevant provisions of applicable civil and commercial law.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
content: The Provider reserves the right to modify these Terms of Service. Changes take effect on the day of publication on the website.
Existing customers will be informed about changes by email or other appropriate means at least 14 days before they take effect.
By continuing to use the services after changes take effect, the Customer expresses agreement with the new terms.

questions.title: Questions about Terms of Service?
questions.content: Contact us and we'll be happy to explain everything.
